question.text: Arrange the following types of soil in increasing order based on the size of the mineral particles in them.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo><</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

solution.text: The particle size of clay is 0.002 mm, while that of silt is 0.002 to 0.05 mm. The particle size of fine sand is 0.05 to 0.2 mm, while that of coarse sand is 0.2 to 2 mm.
